title: Psychiana, A Mail Order Religion Created in the Small Town of Moscow, Idaho
description: Short video describing Psychiana, a mail order religion that preached the New Thought Movement. In 1928, Dr. Frank B. Robinson created Psychiana in Moscow, Idaho.
creator: Northwest Public Broadcasting
subject: Religion; Frank B. Robinson
publisher-digital: Northwest Public Broadcasting
source: Northwest Public Broadcasting

title: Good News
description: Radio program corresponding with transcript of Radio Psychiana - Series for Dr. Frank B. Robinson No. 3. Episode begins proclaiming the growth of Pyschiana and then takes listeners to Robinson's home in Moscow, Idaho, describing its appearance. A dialogue begins between a 'guide' and Robinson about miracles, healing, the God-Law, the mail Robinson receives, and the 'Life Impulse' or 'motivating spirit' that allows people to think and live with God.
creator: The Izzard Company
subject: God-Law; Life Spirit; Mircales; Healing; Sudent Letters; Testimonials
publisher-digital: University of Idaho Library Digital Initiatives, https://www.lib.uidaho.edu/digital/
source: MG 101, Frank Bruce Robinson. Papers, 1929-1951, University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives
rights: Educational use includes non-commercial use of text and images in materials for teaching and research purposes.
